_xResult.title: Yank Cropped Linen Pants
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made wide-leg linen pants with elastic waistband
_xResult.longdesc:
As far as we're concerned, these are the perfect warm-weather pants. They're made of 100% breathable linen, they're wide-leg for extra airflow (and style), and they can be dressed down or dressed up according to the need. Imagine these pants with a silky, ink-blue blouse—quite elegant, no? But throw on a T-shirt over it and this can be your comfy work-from-home outfit!

 

The pants are available in 31 colors, so check out the color palette in the last picture and indicate your color preference during checkout.

 

Shantima uses Oeko-Tex certified 100% European linen fabrics which guarantees that it meets human-ecological requirements. The fabric comes pre-washed so it is already soft and will no longer shrink.

properties.propvalue: Gentle machine wash on low temperatures with soft washing agents. Machine drying in the most gentle way, please use cool temperature. Avoid overdrying.Â  No ironing required to maintain relaxed and wrinkled texture.
